Customer Number.rule: Extract using pattern: 'Invoice No Customer No Invoice Period Date\n\d+\s+(\d+)'

Invoice Period.rule: Extract using pattern: 'Invoice No Customer No Invoice Period Date\n\d+\s+\d+\s+(\d{1,2}\.\d{1,2}\.\d{4}\s+-\s+\d{1,2}\.\d{1,2}\.\d{4})'

Date.rule: Extract using pattern: 'Invoice No Customer No Invoice Period Date\n\d+\s+\d+\s+\d{1,2}\.\d{1,2}\.\d{4}\s+-\s+\d{1,2}\.\d{1,2}\.\d{4}\s+(\d{1,2}\.\s\w+\s\d{4})'

Gross Amount.rule: Extract using pattern: 'Gross Amount incl. VAT\s+([\d,.]+) €'
